title: Reddit - The heart of the internet
text: Strategy - Best opening word: Aaron - Don't grind wordle for more than 2 hours every day. - Consistency is key. Session length is not. - Grinding wordle for 15 minutes a day every day is better than grinding for 5 hours a day one day a week. - You will win some and you will lose some. It's important to keep your head on your shoulders.
